name: The Frogman of Marquette
description:
The Frogman of Marquette is a short visual novel about a mystery surrounding a legendary small town monster, Frog Legs Phil. After running into the monster one night while on vacation you decide to get to the bottom of the mysterious happenings. Although your friends; Anna, Rebecca, and Lena are more interested in having fun and relaxing than solving mysteries.

This game only has one ending. There are a couple of choices however they do not actually effect the ending.
